skill.name: Song of Hidden Resolve
skill.value: Deals 1743/ DMG to all enemies, with a moderate chance of inflicting Poison.

ability.name: The Five Swords Under Heaven (Lv. 65)
ability.value: Sharply increases all allies' Crit DMG when this daemon is Team Leader.
